thread.title: Oil Kings struggles continue as even-strength offence slow to come [Photos]
thread.title_full: Oil Kings struggles continue as even-strength offence slow to come [Photos]

title: Oil Kings struggles continue as even-strength offence slow to come [Photos]
text:
By Brian Swane , Edmonton Sun First posted: Friday, October 16, 2015 10:30 PM MDT | Updated: Friday, October 16, 2015 10:59 PM MDT Photos: Edmonton Oil Kings fall 4-2 to the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton Previous Next 
Edmonton's Dario Meyer (right) celebrates his goal with Brett Pollock during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Regina's Rykr Cole (centre) celebrates a goal during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Kole Gable (right) collides with Regina's Connor Hobbs during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Regina's Brady Pouteau (left) celebrates a goal with goaltender Tyler Brown during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Dario Meyer (left) and Kole Gable (centre) battle Regina's Chase Hamilton during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Brandon Baddock crashes into Regina's Jake Leschyshyn during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Garan Magnes (centre) gets between Regina's goaltender Tyler Brown (left) and James Hilsendager during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Tyler Robertson (centre) and Regina's James Hilsendager (left) and Colton Kroeker crash into the boards during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Lane Bauer (left) battles Regina's Aaron Macklin during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Dario Meyer (right) celebrates his goal with Brett Pollock during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Kobe Mohr (right) is called for interference by linesman Joel Nyberg during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Regina's goaltender Tyler Brown makes a save during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Lane Bauer shoots on Regina's goaltender Tyler Brown's net during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Regina's Tyler Brown goaltends during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Regina's goaltender Tyler Brown makes a save during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun 
Edmonton's Brett Pollock (left) dumps Regina's Aaron Macklin during the first period of a WHL game between the Edmonton Oil Kings and the Regina Pats at Rexall Place in Edmonton, Alta. on Friday October 16, 2015. Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun/Postmedia Network Ian Kucerak/Edmonton Sun
